Type.BattleDialog: Ready for the experiment?
Pressure levels… normal. Vapor concentration… appropriate!
I’ve been itching for action for a while… This should do it!
Wow~! This new piece is gonna be a huge success!
I have sooo many things I wanna know. Where’d you put the books?
This was a total failure…
No… I was just about to… exclaim eureka…
The danger only adds to the thrill!
I guess you won’t be using that anymore, huh? I’ll borrow those parts for a bit!
Don’t you worry! I have a feeling that the next trial will be a big success!
I’ve never seen that kind of tech before! How’d you pull that off?
You guys are fun! Can you show me more stuff?
Good. There’s not many more left, huh?
Yep, I’m all good! Let’s get to it.
I haven’t used this in the field yet… It should be fine, yeah?
Our opponents seem good enough, too!
Once we confirm that it has no issues, we’ll be able to ship it right away.
Let’s see… Did I make sure to fill it up?
Good work, everybody! Shall we boogie now?
This turned out to be pretty handy, didn’t it? I think we can deliver this when we get back!
What sorta books can we nab from here?
I hope we can get various intel…
I’d like to read about other Syndicates.
Oh no… Was there an error in the assembly…?
This can’t be… Where did this go wrong…?
No… I can’t be wrong!
…I’d hoped it wouldn’t fail.
I don’t wanna go out like this…
Lemme guess… It was a bit heavy to swing?
I think that part needed a different component…
Did you see where the problem was?
I don’t think that one was the weapon’s fault.
Let’s just focus on finishing this quickly~
You guys have such good weapons, but you don’t know how to wield them at all…
This is gonna be a good reference, isn’t it?
I can’t wait to pry those secrets out of you!
Shall we handle the rest?
I knew I made the right choice!
